titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that the disallowance of deductions for personal interest shall not apply to interest on loans used to buy highway vehicles.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 1/26/1993--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow a deduction for personal interest on loans used to buy highway vehicles. Reduces such deduction for vehicles costing more than $20,000.
